ygData.subject: Re: I can't Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, your further problem is use DDD instead of screech to get your skill up. With the brass horn - not the mino horn. Like any of them - if your skill is low -
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, your further problem is use DDD instead of screech to get your skill
up. With the brass horn - not the mino horn. Like any of them - if your
skill is low - it will take a bit - picks up, then slows down a bit once
you get near topping off.

I'm still scratching my head on how anyone could have gotten to lvl 26
without using DDD and a horn as that is MY current weapon of choice. Given
an area where I know there is nothing dangerous to hit - I do MUCH more
damage with this - than any weapon I am ever likely to weild.

The damage difference with and without a horn is like night and day.


At 12:45 PM 10/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Wed, 13 Oct 1999 silky@... wrote:
>>
>> Uhhh love - your problem is your Mino Horn - it's wind, not brass.
>
>Seems many of you didn't read further:
>
>> >From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>> >back from dinner to find zero skill increase. Hmm.. Ok, perhaps I *do*
>> >have to be in the PvP area, so I tried that. Same results. Ok, maybe
it's
>> >the Minotaur Horn - maybe it's the problem. So the next time I was in the
>> >bank and thought about it, I traded out my Minotaur Horn (tired of the bag
>> >in my wrist anyhow) for a standard store-bought horn. Last night I tried
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
